name: CountryMusic
0:
”Alexa, open country music”
”Alexa, ask country music what's on”
”Alexa, ask country music what was playing last”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: country music
des:
To play, simply say “Alexa, play country music” or “Alexa, start country music”.
In some cases, it may be necessary to say “Alexa, open the Country Music skill”.
You can stop playback at any time by saying “Alexa, stop”.

Would you like more information? We offer you the following options:

Alexa, ask Country Music what's on.
Alexa, ask Country Music what was playing last.

The radio stream is provided by laut.fm, the User Generated Radio™.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
